page.title: 08How I Spend Saturdays
page.content: On Saturday morning I usually go to Football Training at Damacre Community Centre.It is 25p to get in to the Centre for two hours.After Football Training I go home and have my lunch.I have a sausage roll,a glass of milk,a cream cookie and a snowball. I then go up the street with my friend.We go into Fine Fare to buy sweets and a bottle of juice.We then go to the Glebe and watch Brechin City playing Football.There is a Tuck Shop so that you can buy something to eat at the Football. After the Football I go home for my Tea.On Saturday night my Mum and Dad usually go out and my sister and I stay at my cousin's house.We normally watch Television there.
